reviewText: The Libreros are wonderful instructors and dancers. I have danced for over 20 years and got sloppy with my dancing. I tried several other instructional videos but none can hold a candle to the dance DVDs from the Libreros. Since I purchased this I have 7 more. They are all fantastic. Both Blanch and Emilio teach. Thus both the woman and man see what their part is and then see how the couple move together to make a story on the dance floor. Having their DVS is like having your own Dance Coach in your living room.
easy to learn through these excellent instructions.  Would love more of their dance instructions
